Automobile Liability.Coverage: Applies to owned, hired, and non-owned vehicles
Automobile Liability.Additional Insured: The Daily Bugle (where required by contract)

Workers’ Compensation and Employers Liab.Workers’ Compensation: Statutory limits per New York law

Umbrella/Excess Liability.Coverage: Follows form over General Liability, Auto Liability, and Employers Liability

insurance_requirements: Contractor shall maintain the following insurance coverage during the term of this agreement
additional_requirements: Contractor will operate independently and is responsible for all equipment, transportation, and safety measures
